name: False Spaces
description:
How does it play:

You simply walk from point A to B, interact, read dialogues, and progress through the story. (Mostly...)

Note #1: The demo starts from the middle of the actual game. And so what's happening, may not make full sense. 

Note #2: Both the trailer, and the screenshots here. Contain parts not playable in the demo. (They will be, in the full game.)

Note #3: I do keep a Patreon.

Note #4: I've made other games, you can find here. (After you're done with this one.)
